name: Chatbot
description: The chatbot is a bot for ordering 'fika' from an imaginary company called Fast Fika. The user is presented with options of ordering buns, cakes or sandwiches. The chat conversation is created in JavaScript.

name: Wheater app
description: The Weather app displays the present weather and a 5-day forcast weather of Stockholm. The app was built in Javascript and uses a fetch request to a weather-API. The app is responsive and can be displayed in various devices.

name: Guess Who Game
description: This game is based on the classic Guess Who-game. The user asks questions via a drop down menu and the characters are filtered based on the user's input. The game is built in JavaScript.

name: Music releases
description: This music releases project was built in React using components and an API from Spotify. The user can click the links of the artists and the albums.
